|rad1chip2 = Intersil;ISL3685; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = RP-N-Female |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Per '''D-Link''''s interface emulator.. *the sample SSID is specified as '''default''' *the WLAN OUI may be 00:02:6F ('''[[Senao]]''') Default settings (including SSID) are per '''[[D-Link]]''''s manual. ==Links of Interest== [http://www.dlink.com/dk/da/business-solutions/wireless/access-points/stand-alone/dwl-1750-802-11b-outdoor-bridge-router Product page (D-Link Denmark)]
[http://support.dlink.com/emulators/dwl1750/html/Index.html Interface emulator]
[http://www.dlink.com/dk/da/business-solutions/wireless/access-points/stand-alone/-/media/Business_Products/DWL/DWL%201750/Manual/DWL-1750_Manual_EN_UK.pdf Manual] (appears to be dated 04/11/2003)
[http://www.dlink.com/dk/da/business-solutions/wireless/access-points/stand-alone/-/media/Business_Products/DWL/DWL%201750/Datasheet/DWL-1750_Datasheet_EN_UK.pdf Datasheet] (dated April 2003) :MIL-C-5015 connectors for Serial and Ethernet, requires '''D-Link''''s DC injector (or an adapter) [[Category:English Documentation]]
